alert.note: Alert for Southern Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 01 at 8:41AM MDT until August 01 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR SCATTERED LIGHTNING FOR SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS... .Scattered thunderstorms are forecast to develop this afternoon and extend into the evening. Therefore, a red flag warning has been issued. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR LIGHTNING FOR SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS...WHICH IS FIRE WEATHER ZONE 426... The National Weather Service in Boise has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 3 PM this afternoon to 11 PM MDT this evening. * THUNDERSTORMS...Scattered coverage forecast from mid-afternoon through the evening. * OUTFLOW WINDS...Gusts to 45 mph expected.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly.
